person.persName: John Buckner Lendrum (Covington, KY Justice of the Peace, mayor pro tem, and bookkeeper)

body.p: Born in Westmoreland, Virginia, son of Thomas Keith Lendrum and Margaret Stokes. Resided in Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky. A bookkeeper and justice of the peace. Appointed mayor pro tem of Covington in 1862.
